channel.title: Hello! I'm David from PushSilver.com
channel.description:
I'm a jack-of-all-trades designer/developer hybrid. I spent the early part of my career working in agencies and freelancing and have been spending the last few years building products.
Earlier this year, I released PushSilver(.com), a micro-invoicing SaaS. It's been a small taste of what running a product is like. I've done very literal promotion and the homepage is a joke. :-) I'm interested in potentially fleshing it out more, but the app serves my needs perfectly at the moment.
I also have a number of products either in stealth mode (on active domains but with no marketing), in various stages of development/prototype phase or sitting in permanent limbo. I'm searching for my next steps in going full-time with a 1-3 man team and which product to base that on.
Glad to be here, and here's hoping I don't lurk too much as I tend to do!

item.title: Hello! I'm David from PushSilver.com
item.dc:creator: shantnu
item.description:
Welcome David.

Heres the link: https://pushsilver.com/

Read full topic

item.title: Hello! I'm David from PushSilver.com
item.dc:creator: davidhemphill
item.description:
I’m a jack-of-all-trades designer/developer hybrid. I spent the early part of my career working in agencies and freelancing and have been spending the last few years building products.

Earlier this year, I released PushSilver(.com), a micro-invoicing SaaS. It’s been a small taste of what running a product is like. I’ve done very literal promotion and the homepage is a joke. I’m interested in potentially fleshing it out more, but the app serves my needs perfectly at the moment.

I also have a number of products either in stealth mode (on active domains but with no marketing), in various stages of development/prototype phase or sitting in permanent limbo. I’m searching for my next steps in going full-time with a 1-3 man team and which product to base that on.

Glad to be here, and here’s hoping I don’t lurk too much as I tend to do!
